body: Trilinos install fails when trying to build against the latest version of netcdf (@4.7.2) -- it appears unable to find certain netcdf header files in the expected locations. This PR would temporarily constrain trilinos to use netcdf@:4.7.1 until the issue can be resolved. @becker33
title: trilinos: temporarily pin to ^netcdf@:4.7.1 until build issues resolved with newer versions
